title: よ
a: Speaker wants to point something out or make something aware to listener. "You know?"

title: ね
a: Speaker is seeking agreement and confirmation. "Right?", "Isn't it?"

title: ね
a: As for today, (it's) hot, isn't it?

title: よ
a: As for tomorrow, (I'm) busy, you know

title: よね
a: As for ramen, (it's) tasty you know, isn't it?!

meta.question_specific: ラーメンは、おいしいですよね！
